content: In https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-conceptmap-unmapped-mode.html, if the unmapped mode is 'provided', we want to use the code as provided in the $translate request. Which system should we return in this case? Do we want to return the system in the same group as the unmapped field, or the source or target system in the request?
<edited after I read the question properly> The code provided in the request always has a system associated with it, so it would be that system
Or at least, that's the way I would interpret it
The description is confusing. "Use the code as provided in the $translate request." The only code provided in the $translate operation is the source code.
